testcase.classname: Given the createMachine factory when registering methods
testcase.name: should create methods dynamically (based on states and actions)

testcase.classname: Given the createMachine factory when registering methods
testcase.name: should dispatch an action with the given payload

testcase.classname: Given the createMachine factory when registering methods
testcase.name: should check if the machine is in a particular state

testcase.classname: Given the createMachine factory when validating config
testcase.name: should throw errors if state or transitions are missing

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when dispatching an action which is missing in the current state
testcase.name: should throw an error

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when there is nothing for the current state
testcase.name: should return false

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when we transition to a state which has no actions inside or it is not defined
testcase.name: should throw an error if there is no such a state defined

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when we transition to a state which has no actions inside or it is not defined
testcase.name: should throw an error if there the state has no actions inside

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a string
testcase.name: should change the state of the machine to that string

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is an object
testcase.name: should change the state of the machine to that object

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a function
testcase.name: should call the handler with the current state and the given payload

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a function
testcase.name: should update the state

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a function
testcase.name: should update the state even if a string is returned

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a function
testcase.name: should run the handler with the machine as a context

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a generator
testcase.name: should change the state if we return a string

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a generator
testcase.name: should change the state if we yield a primitive

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a generator
testcase.name: should change the state if we yield an object

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a generator and we use the call helper
testcase.name: should execute the function and return the result

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a generator and we use the call helper and when the function returns a promise
testcase.name: should return the value of the resolved promise

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a generator and we use the call helper and when the function returns a promise
testcase.name: should throw an error if the promise is rejected

testcase.classname: Given the handleAction function when the handler is a generator and we use the call helper when the function returns another generator
testcase.name: should iterate through that inner generator

testcase.classname: Given the Stent library when creating a new machine
testcase.name: should have the machine with its name set up

testcase.classname: Given the Stent library when `get`ing a machine
testcase.name: should return the machine if it exists

testcase.classname: Given the Stent library when `get`ing a machine
testcase.name: should throw an error if the machine does not exist

testcase.classname: Given the toCamelCase helper when using toCamelCase
testcase.name: should transform a given string to a camel case

testcase.classname: Given the validateState helper when using validateState
testcase.name: throw an error if the state has no "name" property inside
